review.reviewBody: R2. Yang-Zhou Style Fried Rice / 揚州炒飯 and B4. Spicy Ginger Beef / 干煸牛肉絲 is my go to order. Sooo good everytime and portions are good as well.

B4. Spicy Ginger Beef / 干煸牛肉絲 a little over cooked, had a slight burn taste. 
D20. ie Dumplings (8 Pcs) / 素菜餃 bland.
R7. Vegetable Fried Rice / 什菜炒飯 bland.
I was skeptical to pay 20$ for one item the spiced F15. Singapore Style Fried Vermicelli but it was way more than worth  it. So flavourful and came hot
Amazing tasting! Love the quality and tastes. Very good food.

R8. Tomato & Egg on Steamed Rice / 番茄雞蛋飯 is good comfort food. The D14. Lamb Dumplings (10 Pcs) / 羊肉水餃  would have benefitted from a dipping sauce vinegar to cut the greasiness. I did not finish the dumplings.
